UAObject.Description: The Configuration Object provides the descriptions (metadata) for settings, stop reasons and root causes of the machine module as well as affordances to make modifications.

UAMethod.Description: The GetRootCauseGroupList Method returns the complete list of root cause groups as persisted by the server.

uax:Description.uax:Text: The complete list of root cause groups.
The extended feedback returning a detailed message in case of execution failure.

UAMethod.Description: The GetRootCauseList Method returns the complete list of root causes as persisted by the server.

uax:Description.uax:Text: The complete list of root cause messages.
The extended feedback returning a detailed message in case of execution failure.

UAMethod.Description: The GetStopReasonList Method returns the complete list of stop reasons as persisted by the server.

uax:Description.uax:Text: The complete list of stop reason messages.
The extended feedback returning a detailed message in case of execution failure.

UAVariable.Description: The Property LastChangeDate is the date and time of the last change applied to the machine module configuration and the effective date of the modification.
The Property LongestMicroStopDuration is the maximum duration of a micro-stop in seconds, longer stops are not micro-stops. Operators are not required to enter a root cause for micro-stops.
The Property RootCauseGroupList is the list of groups that root causes can be grouped in. They are defined by the end user.

The Property RootCauseList is the complete list of the root causes that the end user has defined to classify and organize the downtime due to the machine module stops. The RootCauseList is user defined.

The Property RootCauseListInputIsMandatory is true when the operator is mandatorily required to select the root cause that best describes the current stop situation. For micro- stops such requirement does not apply.

UAMethod.Description: The SetDataSetListMESID Method sets the MES_ID of one or more items of the array Definitions contained in the DataSetList. Each item of Definitions is identified by its ID.

uax:Description.uax:Text: The IDs of the elements of the Definitions array whose MES_ID shall be changed if the method executes successfully.
The values of the MES_IDs to be set.
The extended feedback returning a detailed message in case of execution failure.

UAMethod.Description: The SetRootCauseLists Method sets both the RootCauseList and RootCauseGroupList according to the input arguments.

uax:Description.uax:Text: The list of root causes to be transferred to and used by the server.
The list of root cause groups to be transferred to and used by the server.
The extended feedback returning a detailed message in case of execution failure.

UAVariable.Description: The Property StopReasonList is a list containing the descriptors for all the possible machine module messages, including alarms and warnings. Messages include their localization. The list is defined, created and maintained by the OEM.
Address (pathname in the file system or a URL | Web address) of user manual for the device
Overall revision level of the device
Revision level of the hardware of the device

UAObject.Description: The LIveStatus Object provides information about the real time status of the machine module and provides affordances to control the machine module remotely in real time.

UAMethod.Description: The AcknowledgeAlarms Method acknowledges all alarms of the machine module.

uax:Description.uax:Text: The extended feedback returning a detailed message in case of execution failure.

UAObject.Description: The Alarms folder contains alarms of the machine module.

UAVariable.Description: The ControlMode property describes the current control mode of the machine.
The IdleEnergySavingMode Property is set to True when the energy saving mode during the idle phase is set.

UAMethod.Description: The method resets all aggregated values calculated by each ProcessItem

uax:Description.uax:Text: The extended feedback returning a detailed message in case of execution failure.

UAMethod.Description: The Method SendCommand sends a command to change the state of the machine module state machine. The Method SendCommand sends a command to change the state of the machine module state machine.

uax:Description.uax:Text: The command to be sent to the machine module.
The extended feedback returning a detailed message in case of execution failure.

UAMethod.Description: The SetControlMode Method sets the control mode of the machine module.

uax:Description.uax:Text: The control mode to be set to the machine module.
The extended feedback returning a detailed message in case of execution failure.

UAMethod.Description: The Method SetIdleEnergySavingMode activates the energy saving mode when the machine module is idle.

uax:Description.uax:Text: The energy saving mode to set.
The extended feedback returning a detailed message in case of execution failure.

UAVariable.Description: The Property State describes the status of the state machine controlling the machine module. State provides a subset of the information of the state machine, when the latter is implemented.
Name of the company that manufactured the device

UAObject.Description: The MaterialOutputPoints folder provides the output(s) of the machine module.

UAVariable.Description: The actual rate at which the output is being produced.
Display format for visualization of the AnalogUnitType.
The range for the material quantity value.
The material quantity in base unit of measure.
Display format for visualization of the AnalogUnitType.
Address (pathname in the file system or a URL | Web address) of user manual for the device
Overall revision level of the device
When the downstream machine module cannot receive the product flow, the upstream machine is required to hold the transfer of product to the downstream machine module.
Revision level of the hardware of the device
Name of the company that manufactured the device
The Property MaterialPointDefinition contains the identification of the material point and the material that is processed.
The identification of the material output physical location and the material capabilities.
Unique identifier for the material point in an external system, e.g. MES.
Model name of the device
The nominal rate at which the output is produced, a.k.a. the machine design speed.
Display format for visualization of the AnalogUnitType.
The range for the material quantity value.
The material quantity in base unit of measure.
Display format for visualization of the AnalogUnitType.
The sublot currently being produced by the material output. The sublot quantity is updated by the underlying system as output is generated.
The total quantity of complete sublots created at the machine material output. The value is never reset.
Display format for visualization of the AnalogUnitType.
The range for the material quantity value.
The material quantity in base unit of measure.
Display format for visualization of the AnalogUnitType.
The total quantity of complete sublots created at the machine material output.
Display format for visualization of the AnalogUnitType.
The range for the material quantity value.
The material quantity in base unit of measure.
Display format for visualization of the AnalogUnitType.
The ProductionRateState provides information about the state of the production rate justifying why the ActualProductionRate is different from the NominalProductionRate.
An incremental counter indicating the number of times the static data within the Device has been modified
Identifier that uniquely identifies, within a manufacturer, a device instance
Revision level of the software/firmware of the device
Model name of the device
When Remote is True, all methods exposed by the machine module and contained objects are executed and all variables marked as RW can be written to.
An incremental counter indicating the number of times the static data within the Device has been modified
Identifier that uniquely identifies, within a manufacturer, a device instance
Revision level of the software/firmware of the device

UAMethod.Description: The SetRootCauseLists Method sets both the RootCauseList and RootCauseGroupList according to the input arguments.

uax:Description.uax:Text: The list of root causes to be transferred to and used by the server.

uax:Description.uax:Text: The control mode to be set to the machine module.
The extended feedback returning a detailed message in case of execution failure.

UAMethod.Description: The Method SetIdleEnergySavingMode activates the energy saving mode when the machine module is idle.

uax:Description.uax:Text: The energy saving mode to set.
The extended feedback returning a detailed message in case of execution failure.

UAVariable.Description: The Property State describes the status of the state machine controlling the machine module. State provides a subset of the information of the state machine, when the latter is implemented.
Name of the company that manufactured the device

UAVariable.Description: The actual rate at which the output is being produced.
Display format for visualization of the AnalogUnitType.
The range for the material quantity value.
The material quantity in base unit of measure.
Display format for visualization of the AnalogUnitType.
Address (pathname in the file system or a URL | Web address) of user manual for the device
Overall revision level of the device
When the downstream machine module cannot receive the product flow, the upstream machine is required to hold the transfer of product to the downstream machine module.
Revision level of the hardware of the device
Name of the company that manufactured the device
The Property MaterialPointDefinition contains the identification of the material point and the material that is processed.
The identification of the material output physical location and the material capabilities.
Unique identifier for the material point in an external system, e.g. MES.
Model name of the device
The nominal rate at which the output is produced, a.k.a. the machine design speed.
Display format for visualization of the AnalogUnitType.
The range for the material quantity value.
The material quantity in base unit of measure.
Display format for visualization of the AnalogUnitType.
The sublot currently being produced by the material output. The sublot quantity is updated by the underlying system as output is generated.

The material quantity in base unit of measure.

The ProductionRateState provides information about the state of the production rate justifying why the ActualProductionRate is different from the NominalProductionRate.
An incremental counter indicating the number of times the static data within the Device has been modified
Identifier that uniquely identifies, within a manufacturer, a device instance
Revision level of the software/firmware of the device
Model name of the device
When Remote is True, all methods exposed by the machine module and contained objects are executed and all variables marked as RW can be written to.
An incremental counter indicating the number of times the static data within the Device has been modified
Identifier that uniquely identifies, within a manufacturer, a device instance
Revision level of the software/firmware of the device

UAObject.Description: The Configuration Object provides the descriptions (metadata) for settings, stop reasons and root causes of the machine module as well as affordances to make modifications.

UAMethod.Description: The GetRootCauseGroupList Method returns the complete list of root cause groups as persisted by the server.

uax:Description.uax:Text: The complete list of root cause groups.
The extended feedback returning a detailed message in case of execution failure.

UAMethod.Description: The GetRootCauseList Method returns the complete list of root causes as persisted by the server.

uax:Description.uax:Text: The complete list of root cause messages.
The extended feedback returning a detailed message in case of execution failure.

UAMethod.Description: The GetStopReasonList Method returns the complete list of stop reasons as persisted by the server.

uax:Description.uax:Text: The complete list of stop reason messages.
The extended feedback returning a detailed message in case of execution failure.

UAVariable.Description: The Property LastChangeDate is the date and time of the last change applied to the machine module configuration and the effective date of the modification.
The Property LongestMicroStopDuration is the maximum duration of a micro-stop in seconds, longer stops are not micro-stops. Operators are not required to enter a root cause for micro-stops.
The Property RootCauseGroupList is the list of groups that root causes can be grouped in. They are defined by the end user.

The Property RootCauseList is the complete list of the root causes that the end user has defined to classify and organize the downtime due to the machine module stops. The RootCauseList is user defined.

The Property RootCauseListInputIsMandatory is true when the operator is mandatorily required to select the root cause that best describes the current stop situation. For micro- stops such requirement does not apply.

UAMethod.Description: The SetDataSetListMESID Method sets the MES_ID of one or more items of the array Definitions contained in the DataSetList. Each item of Definitions is identified by its ID.

uax:Description.uax:Text: The IDs of the elements of the Definitions array whose MES_ID shall be changed if the method executes successfully.
The values of the MES_IDs to be set.
The extended feedback returning a detailed message in case of execution failure.

UAMethod.Description: The SetRootCauseLists Method sets both the RootCauseList and RootCauseGroupList according to the input arguments.

uax:Description.uax:Text: The list of root causes to be transferred to and used by the server.
The list of root cause groups to be transferred to and used by the server.
The extended feedback returning a detailed message in case of execution failure.

UAVariable.Description: The Property StopReasonList is a list containing the descriptors for all the possible machine module messages, including alarms and warnings. Messages include their localization. The list is defined, created and maintained by the OEM.
Address (pathname in the file system or a URL | Web address) of user manual for the device
Overall revision level of the device
Revision level of the hardware of the device

UAObject.Description: The LIveStatus Object provides information about the real time status of the machine module and provides affordances to control the machine module remotely in real time.

UAMethod.Description: The AcknowledgeAlarms Method acknowledges all alarms of the machine module.

uax:Description.uax:Text: The extended feedback returning a detailed message in case of execution failure.

UAObject.Description: The Alarms folder contains alarms of the machine module.

UAVariable.Description: The ControlMode property describes the current control mode of the machine.
The IdleEnergySavingMode Property is set to True when the energy saving mode during the idle phase is set.

The extended feedback returning a detailed message in case of execution failure.

UAVariable.Description: The Property LastChangeDate is the date and time of the last change applied to the machine module configuration and the effective date of the modification.
The Property LongestMicroStopDuration is the maximum duration of a micro-stop in seconds, longer stops are not micro-stops. Operators are not required to enter a root cause for micro-stops.
The Property RootCauseGroupList is the list of groups that root causes can be grouped in. They are defined by the end user.

The Property RootCauseList is the complete list of the root causes that the end user has defined to classify and organize the downtime due to the machine module stops. The RootCauseList is user defined.

The Property RootCauseListInputIsMandatory is true when the operator is mandatorily required to select the root cause that best describes the current stop situation. For micro- stops such requirement does not apply.

UAMethod.Description: The SetDataSetListMESID Method sets the MES_ID of one or more items of the array Definitions contained in the DataSetList. Each item of Definitions is identified by its ID.

uax:Description.uax:Text: The IDs of the elements of the Definitions array whose MES_ID shall be changed if the method executes successfully.
The values of the MES_IDs to be set.
The extended feedback returning a detailed message in case of execution failure.

UAMethod.Description: The SetRootCauseLists Method sets both the RootCauseList and RootCauseGroupList according to the input arguments.

uax:Description.uax:Text: The list of root causes to be transferred to and used by the server.
The list of root cause groups to be transferred to and used by the server.
The extended feedback returning a detailed message in case of execution failure.

UAVariable.Description: The Property StopReasonList is a list containing the descriptors for all the possible machine module messages, including alarms and warnings. Messages include their localization. The list is defined, created and maintained by the OEM.
Address (pathname in the file system or a URL | Web address) of user manual for the device
Overall revision level of the device
Revision level of the hardware of the device

UAObject.Description: The LIveStatus Object provides information about the real time status of the machine module and provides affordances to control the machine module remotely in real time.

UAMethod.Description: The AcknowledgeAlarms Method acknowledges all alarms of the machine module.

uax:Description.uax:Text: The extended feedback returning a detailed message in case of execution failure.

UAObject.Description: The Alarms folder contains alarms of the machine module.

UAVariable.Description: The ControlMode property describes the current control mode of the machine.
The IdleEnergySavingMode Property is set to True when the energy saving mode during the idle phase is set.

UAMethod.Description: The method resets all aggregated values calculated by each ProcessItem

uax:Description.uax:Text: The extended feedback returning a detailed message in case of execution failure.

UAMethod.Description: The Method SendCommand sends a command to change the state of the machine module state machine. The Method SendCommand sends a command to change the state of the machine module state machine.

uax:Description.uax:Text: The command to be sent to the machine module.
The extended feedback returning a detailed message in case of execution failure.

UAMethod.Description: The SetControlMode Method sets the control mode of the machine module.

uax:Description.uax:Text: The control mode to be set to the machine module.
The extended feedback returning a detailed message in case of execution failure.

UAMethod.Description: The Method SetIdleEnergySavingMode activates the energy saving mode when the machine module is idle.

uax:Description.uax:Text: The energy saving mode to set.
The extended feedback returning a detailed message in case of execution failure.

UAVariable.Description: The Property State describes the status of the state machine controlling the machine module. State provides a subset of the information of the state machine, when the latter is implemented.
Name of the company that manufactured the device

UAObject.Description: The MaterialOutputPoints folder provides the output(s) of the machine module.

UAVariable.Description: The actual rate at which the output is being produced.
Display format for visualization of the AnalogUnitType.
The range for the material quantity value.
The material quantity in base unit of measure.
Display format for visualization of the AnalogUnitType.
Address (pathname in the file system or a URL | Web address) of user manual for the device
Overall revision level of the device
When the downstream machine module cannot receive the product flow, the upstream machine is required to hold the transfer of product to the downstream machine module.
Revision level of the hardware of the device
Name of the company that manufactured the device
The Property MaterialPointDefinition contains the identification of the material point and the material that is processed.
The identification of the material output physical location and the material capabilities.
Unique identifier for the material point in an external system, e.g. MES.
Model name of the device
The nominal rate at which the output is produced, a.k.a. the machine design speed.
Display format for visualization of the AnalogUnitType.
The range for the material quantity value.
The material quantity in base unit of measure.
Display format for visualization of the AnalogUnitType.
The sublot currently being produced by the material output. The sublot quantity is updated by the underlying system as output is generated.
The total quantity of complete sublots created at the machine material output. The value is never reset.
Display format for visualization of the AnalogUnitType.
The range for the material quantity value.
The material quantity in base unit of measure.
Display format for visualization of the AnalogUnitType.
The total quantity of complete sublots created at the machine material output.
Display format for visualization of the AnalogUnitType.
The range for the material quantity value.
The material quantity in base unit of measure.
Display format for visualization of the AnalogUnitType.
The ProductionRateState provides information about the state of the production rate justifying why the ActualProductionRate is different from the NominalProductionRate.
An incremental counter indicating the number of times the static data within the Device has been modified
Identifier that uniquely identifies, within a manufacturer, a device instance
Revision level of the software/firmware of the device
Model name of the device
When Remote is True, all methods exposed by the machine module and contained objects are executed and all variables marked as RW can be written to.
An incremental counter indicating the number of times the static data within the Device has been modified
Identifier that uniquely identifies, within a manufacturer, a device instance
Revision level of the software/firmware of the device
